items.summary: Update the forum message display in the Section Detail page (frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx) so that when rendering each message, it shows the author's saved profile name (from the `authorName` field already present in the message data structure) instead of displaying 'Anonymous' for users who have a profile. If `authorName` is null or empty, fall back to displaying 'Anonymous'. Do not display the principal ID to end users.
